Previous: Unauthenticated user's view Up: Views Next: Student's view

The teacher view will expand the basic elements by the following teacher functions.

Dashboard

On this site you can see all courses, which you lecture. Besides you can add a new course by completing the form, which will open by clicking on the link.

At the bottom of the dashboard you see a list of all students that are subscribed to your courses.

Course

For every of your courses you can see its survey. Moreover you can create a new lesson by completing the form, which will open by clicking on the link.

Of course you can see the students that are subscribed to that course.
